attributes.action: The House of lords should be abolished as they are not fit for purpose.This will save the tax payer hundreds of thousands
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After reading the disgracful out come on the House of lords abuse of expences, (baroness Uddin) its now time that the unelected Lords should once and for all disappear for good they do not serve anyone but themselves.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
